text: Nice and spacious building near Expo MRt
Nice cosy place to work. Not too big, convenient.  Nice Spinelli coffee in the premises!
Been working here for almost 9 years. Will always remember the days when I was an IBMer

IBM Singapore Technology Park (ISTP). Also known as IMS Singapore (IBM Manufacturing Services). In addition to IBM's Supply Chain operations and an IBM Client Center, Level 3 offices include Labs and teams working on advanced analytics-based research and development (R&D) work, including IBM's Cognitive-related projects.

Food options:
Includes IBM's own canteen with catered food for employees. Ikea (restaurant), Courts (Subway), and Giant (foodcourt). Limited other foodcourts nearby.

ATMs:
Nearest ATMs located across the road in Courts, and can withdraw cash from 7-Eleven in Giant.

Pharmacy:
Giant also has a medical store/Pharmacy with Pharmacist.
IBM is voted as the best 10 workplaces in Singapore.
